ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Imbrued gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: Shada, I really like the loot scheme your guild has.  I am going to foward the link to my guild for review.  Thanks for sharing it with us :) Rokenn ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Shada,
I really like the loot scheme your guild has. I am going to foward the link
to my guild for review. Thanks for sharing it with us :)

Rokenn

From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>

http://www.afterlifeguild.org/

click on the DKPs link at the the top. its been revised a few times in
recent months, but those are the current rules.

just very recently, we have new rules for planar armor that we never had
before. many new 46+ characters were reapoing up items that many very old
level 50 characters needed and who had put in so much more time. so these
are new, i haven't even read them myself:

http://www.afterlifeguild.org/plane_armor.html

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
